name: Decaleon
short_description:
Esperanto Translator - translates grammatic sentences from twelve languages to Esperanto - VB.NET project based on XML - up to 12000 words in each language: extensible Vocabulary for English, French, Spanish, Portoguese, Italian, German, Danish, Swedish, Greek, Russian, Polish and Croatian including context and synonym data as well as semantic group information (Thesaurus). The Decaleon Version 4.0 includes an any-to-any multilingual Dictionary and Vocabulary Trainer (learning niveaus/logic themes/semantic groups) and uses UTF8/Unicode Characters including accents; Export into Text, HTML, TeX, PDF Files; Text files may be imported in other Vocabulary Training Software. Semantic Group Information is finished. 
Decaleon Version 5.0 will provide additional 8500 standard words and an extra technical vocabulary. 
The Sourceforge Project "TEXminer" uses the same XML Database for Text Mining. 
Additional and extra vocabulary is in progress.
summary: Multilingual Esperanto Translator, Word Dictionary, Vocabulary Trainer
